languages.text: "Сейчас, когда я вспоминаю Тассеру, то явно вижу лишь один момент радости — возвращение на корабль". {n}Соломон отвечает сдержаннее обычного, глядя куда-то поверх вашего плеча.{/n}
"When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сейчас, когда я вспоминаю Тассеру, то явно вижу лишь один момент радости — возвращение на корабль". {n}Соломон отвечает сдержаннее обычного, глядя куда-то поверх вашего плеча.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}

"When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}

languages.text: 「タッセーラのことを思い返せば、喜びを感じた瞬間は、私たちが船に戻ったときだけです」{n}ソロモーンはそっけなくそう答え、視線はあなたの肩越しに、どこかを見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラのことを思い返せば、喜びを感じた瞬間は、私たちが船に戻ったときだけです」{n}ソロモーンはそっけなくそう答え、視線はあなたの肩越しに、どこかを見つめていた。{/n}

languages.text: "Wenn ich an Thassera zurückdenke, fällt mir nur ein Moment der Freude ein, und das war, als wir aufs Schiff zurückkehrten", {n}antwortet Solomorne höflich und blickt dabei über deine Schulter in die Ferne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich an Thassera zurückdenke, fällt mir nur ein Moment der Freude ein, und das war, als wir aufs Schiff zurückkehrten", {n}antwortet Solomorne höflich und blickt dabei über deine Schulter in die Ferne.{/n}

languages.text: « Je pense que le seul moment de joie que j'ai vécu à Thassera... c'est quand nous avons regagné notre vaisseau. » {n}Solomorne vous répond sèchement, le regard fixé sur quelque chose situé au-dessus de votre épaule.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que le seul moment de joie que j'ai vécu à Thassera... c'est quand nous avons regagné notre vaisseau. » {n}Solomorne vous répond sèchement, le regard fixé sur quelque chose situé au-dessus de votre épaule.{/n}

languages.text: «Cuando pienso en Thassera, solo recuerdo un único instante de felicidad, y fue cuando volvimos a la nave». {n}Solomorne responde abruptamente; tiene la mirada perdida en algún lugar por encima de tu hombro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuando pienso en Thassera, solo recuerdo un único instante de felicidad, y fue cuando volvimos a la nave». {n}Solomorne responde abruptamente; tiene la mirada perdida en algún lugar por encima de tu hombro.{/n}

languages.text: “每当我想起塔瑟拉，我只能回忆起简短一刻的快乐时光，那就是我们回到船上的时候。”{n}索罗蒙简短地回答道，目光越过了你的肩膀。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “每当我想起塔瑟拉，我只能回忆起简短一刻的快乐时光，那就是我们回到船上的时候。”{n}索罗蒙简短地回答道，目光越过了你的肩膀。{/n}

languages.text: "Thassera'daki vakitlerimi düşündüğümde aklıma tek bir neşeli an geliyor. O da gemiye döndüğümüz an." {n}Bakışları omzunun üzerinden başka bir tarafa yönelen Solomorne, kısaca yanıtlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I think back to Thassera, I can recall only one moment of joy, and that was when we returned to the ship." {n}Solomorne responds curtly, his gaze directed somewhere over your shoulder.{/n}
